titleStmt.title: A medicine for the soule as well as for them that be sick, most necessary in the bytternes of death, and in their last moost daungerous seasons.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 17770a on UMI microfilm reel 716.
Imperfect; lacks all after leaf H6. Catchword, leaf H6: arme.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
